title: Parse error with :coffeescript using single quotes
body:
Here's a sample file.  The same example is fine if I quote using double-quotes instead of single-quotes.  Coffeescript itself handles both versions fine when run outside of jade.

```
:coffeescript
  alert('Double quotes are OK here. Single quotes crash jade.')
```

Here's the output, note how the 2nd ' on line 2 is not preceeded by  a backslash

```
jade t.jade

    if (err) throw err;
             ^

    1. ':coffeescript'
    2. '  alert(\'Double quotes are OK here. Single quotes crash jade.')'
    3. ''
```
